title: "TIME Magazine Includes Armenia’s ‘Robin the Robot’ in Annual ‘Best Innovations’ List"
excerpt: "The first Armenian artificial intelligence-based “Robin the Robot” was recognized as one of the best innovations of 2021 by TIME Magazine. The magazine’s annual list of “100 Best Innovations,” was published this week and described the robot as a “compassionate companion."
